name: Ride with The Reaper
description:
Ride with The reaper is a challenging 2D action-driving game. Inspired by classics from the 8bit age.

The Reaper hunts drivers who do not have guts, everyone knows, so … what else?
You never lift your foot off the accelerator.
Avoid obstacles, jump sinkholes, drive impossible curves, dodge missiles, go through walls , and be faster than The Reaper driving like as if there was no tomorrow



  • Scrolling action driving game inspired by classics
  • Addictive gameplay
  • 40 challenging levels
  • Big bosses
  • Items and power Ups
  • cool retro music
  • absurd humor
